name: SimPoly Drive
description: Get ready to hit the road and become the ultimate transportation tycoon in our latest game! In this low poly style car simulation game, you'll have the chance to build your own car collection, transport goods and people, and experience the thrill of a dynamic day-night cycle in an immersive open world map. With a variety of car types to choose from, including SUVs, mini trucks, and even heavy-duty trucks, there's never a dull moment as you navigate through different terrains and breakable meshes. As you level up, you'll unlock new cars and increase your income, making you a true master of the road. So, rev up your engines and get ready for the ride of a lifetime in our thrilling new game!
